name: Football Games
description: Play the Best Online Football Games for Free on CrazyGames, No Download or Installation Required. 🎮 Play QB Legend and Many More Right Now!

name: Running Games
description: Play the Best Online Running Games for Free on CrazyGames, No Download or Installation Required. 🎮 Play Count Masters: Stickman Games and Many More Right Now!

name: Smash Karts
description: Smash Karts is a 3D multiplayer IO kart battle game. Drive your go-kart, pick up weapons, and blow up other karts to win! Keep playing to level up and unlock new characters and prizes.

name: First Person Shooter Games
description: Play the Best Online First Person Shooter Games for Free on CrazyGames, No Download or Installation Required. 🎮 Play Hazmob FPS: Online Shooter and Many More Right Now!

name: Running Games
description: Play the Best Online Running Games for Free on CrazyGames, No Download or Installation Required. 🎮 Play Count Masters: Stickman Games and Many More Right Now!

name: Moto X3M
description: Moto X3M is a driving bike game that takes dirt bike racing to the next level. It combines high-speed thrills with a test of precision and timing across 22 adrenaline-filled levels. Each course introduces fresh, intense obstacles—from gravity-defying loops to dangerous ramps and explosive traps—keeping you on the edge of your seat. Gear up, strap on your helmet, and prepare to perform stunts of a lifetime as you race against the clock.

name: Drift Hunters
description: Drift Hunters is a free-to-play car 3D game that lets you experience the art of drifting with an impressive range of tuned-up cars and dynamic tracks. Choose from a wide selection of customizable rides, fine-tune your engine, and hit the gas as you glide around corners and perfect your drift technique in 10 unique and challenging locations. Get ready to leave your mark on the asphalt, literally!

name: Paper.io 2
description: Paper.io 2 is a real-time multiplayer .io game where you have to capture as much territory as possible by painting it. Paint the map in your own color to take over the Paper.io world! Look out for other players vying to claim your space.

name: Avoid Games
description: Play the Best Online Avoid Games for Free on CrazyGames, No Download or Installation Required. 🎮 Play Space Waves and Many More Right Now!

name: Basketball Games
description: Play the Best Online Basketball Games for Free on CrazyGames, No Download or Installation Required. 🎮 Play Basketball Orbit and Many More Right Now!

name: Color Zone
description: Color Zone is a vibrant strategy game where card-based combat meets territory control. Build powerful decks, deploy clever unit combos, and paint the arena in your faction’s color to seize dominance. With a mix of tower defense mechanics, upgrades, and customization, every match is a fast-paced battle of brains and bold moves.

name: Clicker Games
description: Play the Best Online Clicker Games for Free on CrazyGames, No Download or Installation Required. 🎮 Play Italian Brainrot Clicker Game and Many More Right Now!

name: War V: Survivor
description: War V: Survivor is a gritty first-person shooter set in a brutal world overrun by infected hordes. Navigate a haunting post-disaster landscape, battle through waves of mutated enemies, and wield real-world weapons enhanced with modular upgrades. With each mission, uncover pieces of a gripping storyline that may hold the cure to save what's left of humanity.

name: Street Food Simulator
description: Street Food Simulator is a fast-paced cooking adventure where you run a food truck and serve up sizzling dishes on the go. Take orders, cook delicious meals, and satisfy hungry customers to earn cash and unlock upgrades. With new recipes, ingredients, and time-management challenges, you’ll build your street food empire one meal at a time.

name: The Quest
description: The Quest is a story-driven adventure where you guide a courageous young boy who wields his father’s sword in search of truth. As you journey across a troubled kingdom, you’ll uncover secrets, face challenges, and confront the source of its sorrow. Your bravery shapes the fate of a land longing for hope.

name: Papaya Summer Farm
description: Papaya Summer Farm is a vibrant tropical adventure where you create a dream getaway on a stunning island paradise. Build and customize your hotel, greet curious guests, and team up to protect rare animals from sneaky poachers. With crystal-clear seas and exotic charm, your island escape is as wild as it is welcoming.

name: Dungeon Master - Cult & Craft
description: Dungeon Master – Cult & Craft is a darkly captivating 3D dungeon management simulator where you reign as the master of an underground empire. Convert simple stickmen into loyal followers, mine precious resources, and grow a powerful cult beneath the surface. Keep faith high or risk losing control of your dominion. The goal of the game is to manage the dungeon, develop your Cult, and maintain power over your followers.

name: Gaz to the Moon
description: Gaz to the Moon is a thrilling vertical adventure where you soar skyward on a tank of gaz, dodging obstacles and pushing your limits. Aim higher with every launch, uncover skybound secrets, and chase the ultimate goal—touching the Moon itself. How far will your gaz take you? There’s only one way to find out.

name: Noob Digger: Pro Drill Miner
description: Noob Digger: Pro Drill Miner is a thrilling mining adventure where you pilot a powerful drill deep into the earth in search of treasures and secrets. Unearth valuable resources, trade for upgrades, and uncover mysterious bunkers to assemble the legendary Super Drill. Dig not just for riches—but to rebuild your dream home and win back your lost love.

name: Smash Block Arena
description: Smash Block Arena is a chaotic boxing game where you dive into ragdoll mayhem with wild physics and unpredictable brawls. Pick your blocky fighter, drag to move, and unleash outrageous punches in fast-paced arenas. With random weapons, quick matches, and hilarious knockouts, every fight turns into a stunt-filled showdown of pure, blocky madness.

name: Money Maker Idle
description: Money Maker Idle is a fast-paced tapping game where you grow a money-printing empire from a humble machine into a financial powerhouse. Upgrade production lanes, unlock slicing bonuses, and trigger cash storms to accelerate your fortune. With every tap, you edge closer to billionaire status in a whirlwind of wealth, strategy, and satisfying money-making chaos.

name: That's My Recipe
description: That's My Recipe is a flavorful puzzle game that puts you in the role of a MasterChef, solving dish-based logic challenges. Use clever hints to drag ingredients into their correct spots and complete each culinary masterpiece. With thoughtful gameplay and a dash of creativity, it’s a feast for puzzle and cooking fans alike.

name: ASMR Beauty Japanese Spa
description: ASMR Beauty Japanese Spa is a relaxing style game where you guide a charming girl through a soothing Japanese hair spa filled with calming treatments and revitalizing masks. Once refreshed, dress her in elegant kimonos, choose delicate accessories, and personalize her look with stunning hairstyles, makeup, and shoes. It's your peaceful retreat into beauty, fashion, and creative expression.

name: Guns vs Zombies
description: Guns vs Zombies is a post-apocalyptic survival game where you merge weapons on your tank to battle relentless waves of the undead. You’ll explore dangerous zones, fortify shelters, and team up with survivors to take down over 30 zombie types. Customize your arsenal, conquer tough bosses, and push through 200 levels of nonstop, strategic combat.

name: AFK Dungeon: Idle Action RPG
description: AFK Dungeon: Idle Action RPG is an idle RPG that challenges you to craft the ultimate hero through smart combinations of items, skills, and traits. Dive into dungeons, grow stronger while you're away, and return to unleash powerful upgrades. Your strategy shapes the journey—mix, match, and conquer every challenge that stands in your path.

name: Bounce Heroes
description: Bounce Heroes is a thrilling blend of idle RPG, merge puzzle, and roguelite action where your hero battles fierce monsters, an evil empire, and ancient beasts, all in pursuit of treasure and victory. Armed with a trusty crossbow and magical bouncy balls dropped by fallen foes, you’ll crush enemies wave after wave.

name: Zombie Horde: Build & Survive
description: Zombie Horde: Build & Survive is a fast-paced tower defense game where your survival depends on smart strategy and fierce action. You’ll build traps, upgrade your gear, and guide your hero through relentless waves of the undead. Stay sharp, plan ahead, and test your limits against a growing horde determined to break through.

name: Crazy Office: Slap and Smash!
description: Crazy Office: Slap and Smash! is a slapstick beat-em-up that turns a dull office into a hilarious battlefield. You’ll throw chairs, swing golf clubs, and cause ragdoll mayhem as you fight your way past coworkers and unhinged bosses. Rise through the floors, unleash chaos, and deliver your final smackdown to the CEO in true cubicle-conquering style.

name: Piece of Cake: Merge and Bake
description: Piece of Cake: Merge and Bake is a puzzle casual game where you help Emily, the main character, breathe new life into her family’s rundown cafe while uncovering long-lost family secrets. Solve a variety of challenging puzzles, manage the cafe's operations, and craft creative item combinations to unlock new chapters of the story. As you progress, enjoy heartwarming moments and unexpected twists that keep you engaged at every turn.

name: Bad Cat - Granny's Return
description: Bad Cat - Granny's Return is a delightful casual adventure where you embrace the life of a mischievous feline. Explore a sprawling house filled with interactive objects to climb, scratch, and topple. Each room offers surprises, unique challenges, and exciting mini-games. Unleash your inner chaos-maker as you leave your mark, literally and figuratively, on every piece of furniture and decor!

name: Doodle Road
description: Doodle Road is an imaginative and captivating 2D casual game that combines creativity with problem-solving. In this fun browser game, your primary objective is to draw a path that will successfully guide a car from the starting point to the finish line. With a multitude of levels to explore, each one introduces new challenges and exciting obstacles that test your creativity and strategic thinking. Draw your way to victory and see how far your creativity can take you!

name: Escape From Pizzeria
description: Escape From Pizzeria is a adventure game where you’re trapped inside a dark, eerie restaurant with secrets lurking in every corner. You’ll navigate creepy hallways, dodge traps, and uncover clues to escape. Stay alert, think fast, and whatever you do, don’t let the chef catch you snooping around his haunted kitchen.

name: Teacher Simulator
description: Teacher Simulator is a fun simulation game in which you play the role of a teacher. Mark exams and ensure the kids are on their best behavior. You may have been the student, but now you get to be the one in charge!

name: Paper Boy Race: Running Game
description: Paper Boy Race: Running Game is a thrilling 3D runner where you speed through bustling city streets on a mission to master the art of newspaper delivery. Dodge traffic, leap over roadblocks, and nail your throws into mailboxes with perfect timing. Upgrade your ride, unlock cool gear, and race to become a true delivery legend.

name: Block Build Destroyer
description: Block Build Destroyer is an idle destruction game where you tear down houses using an expanding lineup of powerful weapons. Begin with basic dynamite and work your way up to swords, pickaxes, and more. Each house brings new challenges, while your auto-attacking arsenal earns resources for upgrades. Reset progress for bonuses and demolish even faster as you chase ultimate destruction!

name: Snake VS Block
description: Snake VS Block is a fast-paced arcade game where you guide a growing snake to smash through waves of numbered bricks. Collect extra balls to extend your snake and ramp up the destruction. Easy to pick up but tough to master, this game dares you to chase ever-higher scores in an endless test of reflexes and strategy.

name: Little Shop
description: Little Shop is a casual management game where you run your bustling store, handling everything from stocking shelves to serving customers. Grow your business by upgrading interiors, expanding space, and adapting to demand. Visit friends’ shops, trade resources, and discover winning strategies. With full control and creative freedom, you're on the path to building a shopping paradise.

name: Punchers
description: Punchers is a 3D boxing sports action game with ragdoll physics. Use move keys to dodge enemy punches and hit back with random punch combinations. You can play against another player or AI.

name: Brainrot Idle Clicker
description: Brainrot Idle Clicker is an incremental game where you tap your way through waves of bizarre enemies in a universe overflowing with wild humor. As you level up, you’ll pick clever cards to evolve your character, unlock strange powers, and take on even weirder challenges. Stay sharp—this world only gets stranger.

name: Pottery Master
description: Pottery Master is a calming, creative journey where you sculpt, shape, and paint your way to ceramic perfection. Use your hands and tools to mold clay into beautiful forms, then bring them to life with color and detail. Each piece is a chance to relax, express yourself, and craft a masterpiece in soothing style.

name: Homesteads: Dream Farm
description: Homesteads: Dream Farm is a simulation game that puts you in charge of a growing frontier town. You’ll manage resources, meet colorful characters, and explore the untamed Wild West. As you build your homestead, forge friendships, and shape your community, every decision you make helps turn the frontier into a thriving settlement full of life.

name: Grandfather Road Chase: Shooter
description: Grandfather Road Chase Realistic Shooter is an adrenaline-pumping shooting game that challenges you to escape relentless pursuits using various weapons acquired throughout the game.

name: Auto Drive: Highway
description: Auto Drive: Highway is a driving game to prove your abilities by dodging traffic and setting your record. Tear down miles to unlock and explore different regions. Use power-ups to your advantage. Drive risky to activate the coin multiplier and collect as many coins as possible. Get and ride all the other cars, upgrade performance, and customize your car appearance. Which will be your ultimate favorite one?

name: Mojo Match 3D
description: Mojo Match 3D is a vibrant puzzle adventure where color and fun collide! Step into a world full of dazzling visuals and 3D match challenges that will keep you entertained for hours.

name: Grass Land
description: Grass Land is a vibrant exploration game that drops you into a sprawling world of thick greenery and hidden surprises. Take control of your grass cutter, uncover valuable resources beneath the overgrowth, and build up your base as you roam the fields. Stay sharp, move fast, and make the most of every patch of grass you find.

name: Rally Racer Dirt
description: Rally Racer Dirt is a rally drift-based game, allows you to drift on both asphalt and dirt terrains while navigating through hills. This category is redefined with the introduction of Rally Racer Dirt, offering the best realistic and stunning controls for a rally game. Enjoy the experience of drifty and realistic tuned physics, coupled with detailed graphics, various vehicles, and racing tracks. Be a rally racer, driving like Ken Blocks and Collin McRae on the tracks. The game features a Realtime Multiplayer Mode, 13 different rally cars, tunable cars with adjustable features, upgradable cars and drive properties, 5 different tuned tracks, and more. Choose between two main game modes: Challenge mode, with 60 different challenges to pass, and Survival mode, where you drift and drive as long as you can, passing checkpoints.

name: Fortzone Battle Royale
description: Fortzone Battle Royale is a high-stakes survival shooter where you face off against rivals in a massive, scenic battleground. Explore forests, cross rivers, and scavenge for resources as the action ramps up quickly. Outsmart enemies, collect powerful bonuses, and fight to be the last one standing in this fast-paced test of skill and strategy.

name: Paper Knight Quest: The Cube World
description: Paper Knight Quest: The Cube World is a thrilling mix of side-scrolling adventure and turn-based RPG battles. You’ll explore a colorful cube world, collect powerful heroes, and build unstoppable squads. Every journey through the semi-randomized dungeons brings new challenges, pushing you to strategize, adapt, and conquer floor after floor. Your ultimate quest for glory awaits!

name: Prison Escape
description: Prison Escape is an action-adventure game where you guide a daring prisoner on a wild journey to freedom. You’ll solve tricky puzzles, adapt to strange twists, and tackle unpredictable mini-games. Each step brings memorable characters and fast-paced challenges that test your wit and courage. Outsmart the odds and carve your own path to escape.

name: Immortal: Dark Slayer
description: Immortal: Dark Slayer is a top-down action RPG that puts you in the armor of a Fallen Knight, battling to purge the realm of demons, the undead, and creeping chaos. Drawing inspiration from the punishing combat of Dark Souls and Elden Ring, it delivers the same gritty challenge, reimagined with a top-down perspective and streamlined controls. Whether you're a seasoned RPG veteran or a newcomer to the genre, this dark fantasy adventure offers a thrilling, accessible experience.

name: Road Battle: Gather the Gang
description: Road Battles: Gather the Gang is a thrilling running game where you rally a massive crew to conquer wild battles. Dash through obstacle-filled roads, scoop up resources, and earn rewards to build a sprawling city and your lavish villa. Collect hats along the way to give your gang some serious personality.

name: Playground Man! Ragdoll Show!
description: Playground Man! Ragdoll Show! is a casual action 3D game with ragdoll physics where you enter a world of destruction. Get ready to tear apart a wooden stickman! Immerse yourself in a physics-based playground, smash obstacles, and relax while solving engaging puzzles.

name: Age of Tanks Warriors: TD War
description: Age of Tanks Warriors: TD War is an action tower defense battle game where you fight your opponent throughout the ages, starting from the Stone Age, making your way all the way to modern marvels. Your main task is strategically dominating the battlefield to constantly upgrade your army and conquer enemies in an epic 1v1 battle. Lead your army to victory in this strategic game and show your earned skills to the modern world.

name: Kirka.io
description: Kirka.io is an online FPS game with a voxelated art style. You can play teams, solo or parkour mode in a range of battle locations. Once you’ve picked a game, you can customize your weapons loadout to suit your playing style.

name: Bloxd.io
description: Bloxd.io is an IO adventure game with Minecraft-style visuals and multiple game modes, including parkour challenges, creative sandbox building, and combat-based gameplay.

name: Stabfish.io
description: Stabfish.io is a free IO game where you play as a deadly oceanic beast. Join a multiplayer arena of fish equipped with fatal tusks and take down your share of prey while avoiding the sharp end of another player’s stabber. Collect the fish like trophies, eat food for boosts, and dominate the sea.

name: Slap and Run
description: Slap and Run is a fast-paced arcade game where your goal is simple—slap as many unsuspecting pedestrians as you can and outrun the chaos that follows. Dodge obstacles, weave through streets, and stay just ahead of the growing mob. Every slap adds to the madness, so keep moving if you want to stay in the game!

name: Shell Shockers
description: Shell Shockers (Shellshock.io) is a multiplayer .io FPS game featuring eggs armed with guns. You control one of these weapon-wielding eggs in one of four online game modes where the aim is to shatter your opponents with bullets and bombs. It's the ultimate online egg shooting game!

name: Krunker
description: Krunker is a fast-paced, pixel-style first-person shooter where players battle it out in online arenas against opponents from around the world. Whether you're playing for fun or competing at a high level, Krunker.io offers nonstop FPS action.

name: Hazmob FPS: Online Shooter
description: Hazmob FPS: Online Shooter is a multiplayer shooting FPS game where every second counts! Play against other players across multiple game modes in non-stop combat. This first-person shooter game is ideal for those seeking a bit of thrill.

name: WorldGuessr Free GeoGuessr
description: Worldguessr is a casual quiz game, a free alternative to Geoguessr, perfect for testing and expanding your geography skills through immersive Street View exploration. Each round, you will find yourself dropped into random locations around the globe, with only environmental clues to guide you in pinpointing your exact whereabouts. From cityscapes to rural roads, your surroundings become the puzzle pieces you need to analyze, turning each game into a thrilling geographical investigation.

name: Four Colors
description: Four Colors lets you play the popular card game for free in your web browser. The aim of the game is to be the first player with no cards, similar to other Crazy Eights style card games. Play a game like UNO in multiplayer with 2, 3, or 4 players.

name: TileMan.io
description: TileMan.io is an awesome multiplayer IO game in which you must try to claim as much territory as possible. You start with a random block color, and you must try to convert all the blocks on the map into the same color. This might sound easy, but don't forget there are other players to contend with!

name: Racing Limits
description: Racing Limits is a racing game that lets you push your skills to the max. Race and overtake vehicles in city and highway traffic with four thrilling game modes: carrier, infinite, against-time, and free mode. Choose between one-way and two-way traffic, and experience three times of day - 'Morning,' 'Sunset,' and 'Night.' With multiple camera angles, sensitive controls, and realistic physics, it's a high-speed adventure you won't want to miss. Customize, upgrade, and take on numerous race events in this graphically stunning racing world!

name: Squid Game Online
description: Squid Game Online is a free multiplayer survival game. Compete in 7 minigames with 30 players based on the viral Netflix show Squid Game. If you fail any of the challenges, you will be eliminated by the Pink Soldiers.

name: Boom Karts
description: Boom Karts is a high-speed racing game where you face off against rivals in competitions. You’ll drift through wild tracks, launch powerful boosts, and outmaneuver opponents in thrilling races. Every corner is a new chance to take the lead—so stay sharp, race smart, and aim for the podium with every lap.

name: Space Waves
description: Space Waves is an arcade game where you need to control an arrow to avoid obstacles until you get to the end. There are 33 levels to the game, and you can choose any level you want to play at any time. All levels vary in difficulty and are labeled accordingly with faces; this way you get to decide how courageous you want to be.

name: Crazy Dummy Swing Multiplayer
description: Crazy Dummy Swing Multiplayer is a fast-paced multiplayer game where you swing, launch, and fling your custom-built dummy across wild obstacle maps. You’ll race to escape the factory, grab onto anchor points, and chase the top of the daily leaderboard. With new maps each day, your timing and creativity decide how far you’ll go.

name: Sky Riders
description: Sky Riders is a high-speed casual vehicle driving game. Put your driving skills to the test as you complete several challenging tracks. Stay focused and avoid falling off! Whether you're behind the wheel of a car or riding a motorcycle, prepare for an adrenaline-fueled adventure and unforgettable racing moments. Get ready to conquer difficult tests and feel the excitement of Sky Riders!

name: EvoWars.io
description: EvoWars.io is an IO battle game set in a top-down online battle arena. Collect orbs and battle other players to evolve your warrior. Each evolution improves your weapon range but slows your movement. How many will you slay before you fall?

name: Cubes 2048.io
description: Cubes 2048.io is an addictive online game that fuses Snake and 2048. Get a bigger number by collecting free cubes and eating other players with a smaller number than you. Your cubes with the same value that bump into one another will merge.

name: Holey.io Battle Royale
description: Holey.io is a battle royale game where you consume various items and opponents with smaller holes. You will grow bigger as you swallow! The map will continuously shrink, forcing players into a narrower environment until there is only one person left standing. Consume, grow, and become the last hole standing in the arena!

name: Mini Golf Club
description: Mini Golf Club is a realistic 3D mini golf simulator with fun gameplay and hundreds of challenging levels.

name: CG FC 25
description: CG FC 25 is a dynamic soccer simulation game that lets you lead your favorite teams to victory. With intuitive joystick controls, sprint and kick features, and realistic 3D stadiums, you'll immerse yourself in intense matches. Choose from Quick Match or Tournament modes, customize your player, and experience the thrill of football in a vibrant, HD arena.

name: Escape From Prison Multiplayer
description: Escape From Prison Multiplayer is a thrilling multiplayer platformer game where your mission is to make a daring escape from prison! Customize your brave little mouse and race against time to break out. Each room you conquer brings you closer to freedom, but watch out for the dangerous traps and obstacles in your way! Can you outsmart the prison's challenges and make a successful escape? Test your skills and find out if you have what it takes to flee from prison!

name: Race Clicker: Tap Tap Game
description: Race Clicker: Tap Tap Game is a clicker game with a thrilling racing experience that challenges your speed, agility, and strategy. Control your runner with a single tap through intricate tracks and obstacles. Train your character to enhance muscle, speed, and endurance, unlocking new skills and items. Master quick reactions and strategic speed usage to outpace opponents and claim victory. With stunning scenery and varied terrain, find the balance between speed and endurance to become the ultimate race champion.

name: Gridpunk - 3v3 Battle Royale
description: Gridpunk - Battle Royale 3v3 PvP is an IO battle game where lightning-fast reflexes and precision will determine how far you make it through to the end of this real-time shooter action. This high-intensity game requires you to stay sharp, aim true, and master the art of drone attacks to outwit and overpower your opponents. Each 3v3 PvP match puts you against players in real-time in multiplayer battles. There’s no room for luck—it's all about skill, strategy, and timing.

name: Build and Crush
description: Build and Crush is a multiplayer game in which you can, you guessed it, build and crush stuff. Choose your own fun!

name: Jump Guys
description: Jump Guys is a casual 3D multiplayer platformer where you navigate vibrant obstacle courses filled with traps, power-ups, and collectibles. Jump, climb, and race to the finish while dodging hazards. Activate power-ups for temporary boosts and collect coins to customize your character. Conquer increasingly difficult worlds with thrilling physics-defying stunts. Only one way forward: only up!

name: Getaway Shootout
description: Getaway Shooter is a chaotic two-player game where you race three others to the finish line. Your moves are limited, and you can only move by jumping left or right, making the race tricky! Pick up guns and other weapons along the way to use against the others. May the best player win!

name: Rooftop Snipers
description: Rooftop Snipers is a chaotic two-button action sniper game where you can only shoot and jump. You can play the game with a friend or on the computer. It’s one of our many amazing two-player games you can play with friends!

name: Far Orion: New Worlds
description: Far Orion: New Worlds is an action game where you can command a team of brave heroes and lead your world to victory! The year is 2121, and technology has advanced far beyond the bounds of our wildest fantasies, but great progress also demands a great sacrifice. Use your strategy to set up your heroes and power card, beat all your opponents, and explore other worlds in search of treasure and limitless power!

name: Run 3
description: Explore outer space in Run 3. Run 3 is an incredibly addicting, endless runner-type action/platforming game in which you play as a little grey alien. The little alien is trespassing in an architecturally challenged area that is floating in space. After trespassing in the prohibited zone which is full of increasing amounts of dangerous holes, you run. If you fall into one of the holes, you will find yourself lost in space so make sure to watch your step!

name: Battleship
description: Battleship is a classic two-player naval strategy game that you can play for free in your web browser. You are the commanding officer of an elite fleet of battleships at war with an equally capable enemy. Take turns to fire on your opponent's territory using an array of ranged weaponry.

name: Duck Life
description: Duck Life is the first game in the Duck Life series. A tornado has struck your farm and destroyed everything. All that remains is a single duck egg. Train this duckling to peak athletic form so you can earn money to rebuild the farm.

name: Cuphead
description: Cuphead is a sidescrolling action game developed by StudioMDHR. Play one of the biggest boss battles where you control a warplane carrying Cuphead. Choose your desired difficulty level and jump into the dog fight.

name: Jacksmith
description: Jacksmith is a crafting game where you forge weapons for soldiers and join them on the battlefield as they slay monsters. Build the perfect weapons to see the soldiers into battle and give them the greatest chance of success!

name: Cookie Delivery
description: Cookie Delivery is an action game about being a cookie deliveryman. This work is dangerous and difficult; in addition to obstacles on the road, you have to shoot back the animals who want to steal the cookies.

name: Castle Craft
description: Castle Craft is a mystical adventure puzzle game where you merge resources while looking for Fiona's missing husband, Michael, all the while uncovering plenty of mysteries along the way. Begin in a fog-covered land, using ancient keys to explore hidden realms and trace the path of your lost family through different eras. Discover mysterious lands and piece together an enchanting legacy.

name: Dead Land: Survival
description: Dead Land: Survival is a survival horror game set in a zombie-infested apocalyptic world where you fight for survival with powerful skills you accumulate throughout gameplay. Fortify your shelter against relentless undead attacks and scavenge through desolate territories in search of valuable resources. Craft weapons, armor, and essential gear to give yourself an edge in these hostile lands. With danger around every corner, your aim is to keep calm and survive the end of the zombie apocalypse.

name: House of Hazards
description: House of Hazards is a fun local multiplayer game where each player completes tasks around the house while avoiding hazards. How far will you get before one of your friends trips you up?

name: Crazy Guys
description: Crazy Guys is a chaotic party game that throws you into colorful, unpredictable obstacle courses packed with wild challenges. You’ll guide your bouncy character through hilarious chaos, dodging traps and racing others to stay in the game. Test your reflexes, embrace the madness, and show everyone you’ve got the moves to reach the finish line.

name: Magic World
description: Magic World is an adventure puzzle game where you engage in unique battles with mythical creatures and fierce enemies by defeating them via gem matching. The gameplay is strategic, as this is not your ordinary battle. Your enemies will use cover and battlefield advantages against you. You'll need a well-thought-out strategy and smart leveling up of all heroes to achieve victory!

name: Hex Empire
description: Hex Empire is the action packed turn-based strategy game in which you will try and conquer all by domination of territory. You will start with a single nation, then your goal is to strategize and dominate the map by overruling countries attacking city by city with your armies and more importantly your winning tactics.

name: Daily Room Escape
description: Daily Room Escape offers a brain-teasing puzzle adventure game where you are in a unique room filled with intricate riddles and hidden clues. Sharpen your problem-solving skills and unravel mind-bending puzzles to find the key to freedom. Each day brings a new theme, a different set of challenges, and fresh surprises waiting to be discovered. Keep coming back for your daily dose of brain-teasing fun, and see if you have what it takes to outsmart each escape room.

name: Battle Arena
description: Battle Arena is a thrilling RPG adventure battle game that seamlessly blends heart-pounding action with strategic gameplay. Create your team from over 50 unique heroes, each inspired by iconic characters you know and love. Dive into intense real-time PvP battles where your skills and tactics are put to the ultimate test. Join forces with fellow guild players to take on epic quests across breathtaking locations, from ancient ruins to mystical landscapes. As you progress, you can upgrade your heroes and gear, enhancing their abilities and unlocking new powers.

name: Doors Online
description: Doors Online is an escape adventure game set in a creepy hotel where danger and riddles lurk behind every door. Explore eerie rooms, search for keys, avoid terrifying monsters, and find hiding spots to survive. Use your dexterity and wit to reach the end of this mysterious journey!

name: Dark Stones: Card Battle RPG
description: Dark Stones: Card Battle RPG is a strategic card-based battle game set in a dark fantasy world of magic and elemental forces. Assemble a team of humans, orcs, mages, elves, and other creatures to defeat powerful foes, capture their souls, and unlock new powers. Explore lands teeming with danger, from snowy valleys to scorched deserts and realms of the dead, while uncovering hidden secrets and facing epic challenges.

name: RPG Games
description: Play the Best Online RPG Games for Free on CrazyGames, No Download or Installation Required. 🎮 Play Immortal: Dark Slayer and Many More Right Now!

name: Little Alchemy 2
description: Little Alchemy 2 is an intuitive online crafting game developed by Recloak. The aim is to combine elements to create new ones. Start by mixing Earth, air, fire, and water to produce new elements. Discover over 700 items and unlock the recipes to time, matter, and the Universe!

name: Mirrorland
description: Mirrorland is a turn-based strategy set in a fantastical realm teeming with heroes and monsters. Embark on an epic journey through this magical world, brimming with perilous encounters and thrilling adventures at every turn. Traverse through the looking glass into a realm of enigmatic puzzles and terrifying foes. Unravel the mysteries, aid mythical beings, vanquish villains, and safeguard the universe of Mirrorland. With stunning visuals, an immersive storyline, diverse hero selection, and engaging multiplayer features, prepare for an unforgettable quest where bravery and cunning are your greatest weapons.

name: Little Alchemy
description: Little Alchemy is a fun and educational game where you mix basic elements like air, earth, fire, and water to craft new and increasingly complex items.

name: Words of Wonders
description: Words of Wonders is a crossword puzzle where you connect letters to reveal hidden words. Test your vocabulary and find all the words to progress and reach more challenging levels. Will you become a master wordsmith in this delightful word game?

name: Marble Run
description: Marble Run is a building sim where you create your own marble run using a range of tools. Use an array of track pieces to build a marble run from top to bottom, then watch the marble roll through your creation for your own enjoyment.

name: Word Wipe
description: Word Wipe is a word search puzzle game where you connect letters to form words and clear them from the grid. Form words by combining letters, causing them to vanish and creating new letter combinations as others drop down.

name: Word Scramble
description: Word Scramble is a classic word game where you unscramble letters to find words. Find one word after the next and see how many you can identify before the timer runs out!

name: Mergest Kingdom
description: Mergest Kingdom is a merge puzzle and match-3 game where you create your kingdom by combining items in threes. Match resources to unlock new items, complete quests, and grow your land. With countless objects to merge and challenges to tackle, you’ll progressively expand your realm and customize it as you see fit. Start building your kingdom now!

name: Candy Riddles
description: Candy Riddles is a puzzle match-3 puzzle game bursting with tasty-looking, mouth-watering sweets! Prepare for a world of sugary fun as you match cookies, donuts, ice creams, and more to rack up points and progress through challenging levels. With each successful match of three or more treats, you'll clear the board and make way for even more delicious combinations. The more matches you make, the bigger your rewards, so keep matching and savor the sweet satisfaction of getting to the next level!

name: Word Games
description: Play the Best Online Word Games for Free on CrazyGames, No Download or Installation Required. 🎮 Play Words of Wonders and Many More Right Now!

name: Soccer Random
description: Soccer Random is a two-player pixel-art soccer game with limited controls but unlimited randomness. Players hop and kick on the pitch with just one click, trying to score a goal with limited movement. You can choose a one-player game against the computer or two-player with a friend as your opponent.

name: Penalty Shooters 2
description: Penalty Shooters 2 is a soccer game where you shoot penalties in a fantasy league of your choice. Alternate between shooter and goalkeeper in intense penalty shootouts. Win the match to continue in the league and take your shot at becoming the champion.

name: Zoo Boom
description: Zoo Boom is a puzzle match-3 game with mission-based rounds to challenge you at every level. This fun animal-themed game is an addictive one-click game where your objective is to strategically clear boards of animal tiles without getting yourself stuck into a lack of matches. Get ready for some good old-fashioned match game fun.

name: Soccer Legends 2021
description: Soccer Legends 2021 is a sports soccer two-player game and the newest installment in the widely popular Soccer Legends series by MadPuffers, bringing the excitement of fast-paced soccer action to the next level. Packed with fresh updates, this game introduces a variety of new players and teams, each with their own unique skills and playing styles. Whether you’re a seasoned fan of the series or a newcomer, Soccer Legends 2021 offers a dynamic and entertaining experience that combines arcade-style gameplay with competitive strategy. Play solo against AI or challenge your friend to a 1-on-1 match!

name: Basketball Superstars
description: Basketball Superstars is a dynamic basketball experience where you create and train your ultimate player. Customize your gear, enhance your skills, and face intense rivals in fast-paced matches. Whether you are outsmarting opponents or perfecting your strategy, each game delivers action and excitement as you strive to dominate the court and showcase your prowess.

name: The Speedy Golf
description: The Speedy Golf is a mouse-only golf game. Aim carefully and get fantastic scores.

name: Basketball Orbit
description: Basketball Orbit is an exhilarating sports basketball simulation game in our sports category, where you aim to launch basketballs to unbelievable heights, even beyond Earth’s atmosphere! Take on thrilling one-shot basketball challenges, conquer tricky levels, and perfect your shooting technique. Compete to become the ultimate basketball legend in this fun and unique basketball adventure!

name: BasketBros
description: BasketBros is a fast-paced basketball game with online and offline gameplay. Choose a basketballer, customize your style, and compete in singleplayer and multiplayer games. Throw down some sick dunks and win the game to earn upgrades and unlockables.

name: Golf Orbit
description: Golf Orbit is an exciting golf simulator game within our sports category where you aim to launch golf balls to incredible heights, even reaching Mars. Have fun in one-shot golf battles, complete challenging levels, and master the art of the perfect shot. Compete to become the golf king in this entertaining and unique golfing adventure.

name: Return Man 2
description: Return Man 2 - become a pro running back! Jump back into the action of American Football games in this second installment of the Return Man series. This fantastic sports game brings a whole host of awesome challenges, levels, and special moves. The retro graphics and fun football gameplay are superb.

name: Time Shooter 2
description: Time Shooter 2 is a first-person shooter where time stands still until you move. Plan your shots and moves carefully. Dodge enemy fire in epic slo-mo combat and make your way around the map using time to your advantage.

name: Bullet Force
description: Bullet Force is an online multiplayer FPS game featuring fast-paced action. Battle against other players on tactical maps using a range of weapons at your disposal. Crate custom games and buy new perks to improve your character.

name: SkillWarz
description: SkillWarz is a fast-paced first-person shooter offering advanced movement mechanics and diverse game modes like Deathmatch, Gun Game, and Skull Hunt. Navigate through dynamic day and night maps featuring bounce pads, teleports, and battle pickups. Unlock unique classes, customize your gear, and challenge others or practice against bots in action-packed matches tailored to your style.

name: Voxiom.io
description: Voxiom.io is a 3D real-time multiplayer first-person voxel shooter featuring destructible maps. The game is inspired by popular titles, such as Minecraft, Fortnite, Counter-Strike, and Call of Duty. Currently, the game features 4 game modes: capture the gems, battle royale, survival, and free-for-all. Build, craft, and shoot strategically to achieve victory!

name: Ev.io
description: Ev.io is a multiplayer FPS game set in a futuristic arena. The game features tactical-level designs similar to Halo, Destiny, and Quake. You have various weapons and abilities that can be used to your advantage on the battlefield. Click to jump straight into the fight!

name: Agar.io
description: Agar.io is the original .io grow game. Play as a simple agar cell fighting to become the largest cell in a multiplayer game arena. Avoid the bigger cells and consume the smaller ones to grow larger.

name: DEADSHOT.io
description: DEADSHOT.io is a high-octane IO first-person shooter that drops you into nonstop action across a variety of ever-changing maps. Arm yourself with a wide range of weapons and explore multiple game modes that keep the gameplay fresh. Face off against friends or challenge global players in fast-paced matches, and log in to access exclusive perks and upgrades that give you a competitive edge.

name: Worm Hunt
description: Worm Hunt is a .io game where you battle against other worms in a colorful online arena. Squirm around, picking up food and boosters to grow your worm bigger. Use your coins to buy various skins and upgrades for the next game!

name: 1v1.LOL
description: 1v1.lol is a competitive online third-person shooter where you build your way around the map tactically. You can build platforms, ramps, and walls to aid your defenses and gain an advantage. The main game mode is 1v1 battle royale, where the winner is the last player standing.

name: Snake.io
description: Snake.io is an online io game where you control a snake, striving to survive in a battlefield of other snakes. Consume colorful food to grow larger and defeat rivals to become a formidable force

name: Diep.io
description: Diep.io is a survival .io game where you control a circle armed with a cannon. The aim is simple - move around the map and destroy the other players whilst improving and upgrading your own circle.

name: Doge Miner 2
description: Doge Miner is back in this fantastic sequel – Doge Miner 2! The mission remains the same: to purchase a spaceship and blast off to the moon, but you now have an increase amount of tools, upgrades and options at your disposal. Doge Miner 2 builds upon the fun mechanisms and gameplay of the original title and adds extras features for your enjoyment.

name: Planet Clicker
description: Planet Clicker is a simple clicker game in which your goal is to increase energy production and colonize other planets. Buy and upgrade various means of energy production, and watch the units flow!

name: Doge Miner
description: Doge Miner is an awesome incremental game featuring everyone’s favorite shibe inu pup. It is an idle game inspired by Cookie Clicker where the goal of the game is to click your way to the moon! 🚀For the sequel, check out Doge Miner 2.

name: Babel Tower
description: Babel Tower is a full-featured clicker-idle game with a mission to complete the Tower of Babel.

name: Crusher Clicker
description: Crusher Clicker is an addictive game where you smash rocks and crystals, then upgrade to enhance your crushing power and speed. It's like operating a hydraulic press but with a satisfying, stress-relieving twist. Boost your crusher's power, speed, and gravity for even more dramatic destruction. Get lost in the colorful physics and the endlessly engaging gameplay.

name: Money Factory
description: Money Factory is a fast-paced, clicker incremental game where you build your financial empire by strategically connecting tokens on the game board. Each connection generates cash, and the more valuable the tokens you combine, the faster your earnings soar. Plan your moves carefully, optimize your token placements, and watch as your money factory transforms into a booming financial powerhouse!

name: Corn Tycoon
description: Corn Tycoon is the ultimate farm adventure where you can grow, harvest, and sell delicious corn to become the richest farmer in town! Start by clicking on your fields to plant seeds, water them, and harvest corn. As you grow more crops, you can buy handy machines like seeders, irrigators, and harvesters to do the work faster. Don’t forget to upgrade your silos to store more corn and your water tanks to keep your fields nice and green. The more corn you grow, the more money you make! But that’s not all; Corn Tycoon is full of ways to boost your farm and earn even faster! Upgrade your trucks to transport more corn and sell it quicker at the market. Keep an eye on the sky for the flying piggy bank—click it as fast as you can to get a big money boost! As you harvest more and more corn, you’ll be able to prestige, restarting from scratch but unlocking much more expensive corn! Visit the lab to discover awesome upgrades that make your corn worth more, speed up your machines, and even help your soil grow crops quicker. Your farm becomes bigger, faster, and more profitable with every upgrade. Can you become the ultimate Corn Tycoon and grow the biggest corn empire ever? Get ready to click, plant, and harvest your way to farming fame. Let the corn adventure begin!

name: Block Wall Destroyer
description: Block Wall Destroyer is an addictive idle destruction game where breaking walls is the key to progress! You start with a simple pickaxe—but don’t be fooled! You can mine, toss, and spin your tools to smash through walls and reach new levels of destruction.

name: Clicker Heroes
description: Clicker Heroes is an original idle clicker game. Go on an epic adventure and slay monsters, upgrade heroes with the gold you collect, find treasures, and kill bosses. Clicker Heroes is a game that helped propel clicker games into the mainstream alongside other classics like Idle Breakout.

name: Crazy Roll 3D
description: Crazyroll 3D is an addictive endless running game inspired by Slope. Control a ball that’s thrust down a series of slanted and sloped platforms. Avoid all the obstacles, collect diamonds, and roll as far you can!

name: Leek Factory Tycoon
description: Leek Factory Tycoon is an idle game where you will be managing your dream Leek Factory. Enjoy a steady flow of idle cash as you expand and upgrade your factories for big profits. Build an extensive conveyor belt system to transport and process your leeks, creating fantastic recipes. Even when you're offline, your restaurant stays open, earning you passive income. Play at your own pace or fine-tune your empire to compete on the live global leaderboard. Show the world your restaurant strategy is the most profitable!

name: Rocking Sky Trip
description: Rocking Sky Trip is an exciting endless running game in which you must control a rolling ball through a series of platforms and obstacles. This might sound easy, but the gameplay is fast-paced and the obstacles come thick and fast. If you hit any obstacle on the level then you have to restart – your reactions have to be really quick and you have to keep moving and swerving at all times!

name: Crazy Flips 3D
description: Crazy Flips 3D is an awesome sports game to do perfect flips, such as frontflips, backflips, and gainer tricks from high cliffs.

name: Friday Night Funkin'
description: Friday Night Funkin’ is a rhythm-based music game where you face off in freestyle battles by hitting the arrow keys in sync with the beat to outplay your rivals and groove to catchy tunes!

name: Leap and Avoid 2
description: Leap and Avoid 2 is a thrilling platform adventure where you guide a nimble white ball through treacherous caves and high-tech labs. Navigate white platforms, dodge the deadly black ones, and uncover hidden paths brimming with coins. Use your earnings to unlock upgrades like shields and speed boosts as you race for secrets, treasures, and leaderboard glory.

name: Fireboy and Watergirl 6: Fairy Tales
description: Fireboy and Watergirl 6 Fairy Tales is a casual game, the sixth puzzling platformer in the Fireboy and Watergirl series. This time, you’re exploring a new temple with fairies that help you solve puzzles.

name: Drift Boss
description: Drift Boss is a casual one-click driving game where you drive your car around very tricky corners and over bumps, aiming to reach what seems like an infinite end! The race track has no guardrails, so you will fall off the platform and into an abyss if you make one false move. Keep playing to earn rewards and unlock better cars!

name: Getting Over It
description: Getting Over It is a challenging casual arcade climbing game that puts your patience—and skill—to the ultimate test. Armed with only a hammer, you’ll tackle a steep, obstacle-laden mountain, relying on precise physics to swing, push, and propel yourself upward. Every inch you gain will make you sweat but will be well worth it, and one small mistake can send you tumbling back to the start.

name: Helix Jump
description: Helix Jump is a casual game with simple and addictively fun mechanics. In the game, you guide a bouncing ball continuously down a series of circular platforms until you crash. Fall through the cracks and avoid landing in the forbidden zones!

name: Squirrel with a Gun!
description: Squirrel With a Gun! is a quirky arcade shooter where you take on the role of a checkered squirrel armed with awesome weaponry and acrobatic moves. Battle against nut-headed enemies, dodging in slow-motion parkour while you snatch up their precious nuts. Navigate exciting levels filled with hilarious enemies and outrageous challenges to earn rewards. Unleash the squirrel’s unique arsenal, perfect your aim, and help him become the ultimate nut-capturing champion!

name: Count Masters: Stickman Games
description: Count Masters: Stickman Games is a fast-paced running game where you gather a growing army of stickmen to clash against rival crowds. Navigate through obstacles, choose the best paths to multiply your numbers, and lead your team to victory. Battle fierce opponents, defeat the King-stickman, and claim the castle in an action-packed race filled with strategy and excitement!

name: Street Fighter 2
description: Street Fighter 2 is a classic fighting game featuring the epic Ryu vs Sagat fight. Use a combination of hadoukens and shoryukens to beat Sagat into submission.

name: Jet Rush
description: Jet Rush is an awesome platform game with superb arcade-style gameplay. You control a high-tech jet plane and you must pilot it through a series of challenging courses and obstacles. The controls to drive your jet are straightforward. The gameplay, however, is anything but simple! The speed of your plane is fast and you must work hard to avoid the obstacles and conquer each level.

name: Color Tunnel
description: Color Tunnel is an endless running game to zoom at high speed through the colorful tunnel avoiding obstacles. The game takes you through various levels with challenging new obstacles the further you progress!
